Name: TC_LOGIN_001
Precondition:
User has an active account
Login page opened
Objective: Verify to login with valid credentials
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Username field accepts the entered value without displaying any validation 
error

Password field accepts the entered value without displaying any validation 
error
User is successfully logged in and redirected to the dashboard page

Name: TC_LOGIN_002
Precondition:
-User has a locked account
-Login page opened
Objective: To verify that a user cannot log in with a locked out account
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Username field accepts the entered value without displaying any validation 
error

Password field accepts the entered value without displaying any validation 
error

User should see a locked account error message and should not be redirected 
to the dashboard

Name: TC_LOGIN_003
Objective: To verify that a user cannot log in with an empty password
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Username field accepts the entered value without displaying any validation 
error
Password field remains empty without displaying any validation error

User should see an empty password error message and should not be 
redirected to the dashboard

Name: TC_LOGIN_004
Precondition:
User has an active account
Login page opened
Objective: To verify that a user cannot log in with an empty username
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re: Username field remains empty without displaying any validation error

Password field accepts the entered value without displaying any validation 
error

User should see a username required error message and should not be 
redirected to the dashboard

Name: TC_LOGIN_005
Precondition:
User has an active account
Login page opened
Objective: To verify that a user cannot log in with an invalid password
Test Script (Step-by-Step) - Expected Re:
Username field accepts the entered value without displaying any validation 
error

Password field accepts the entered value without displaying any validation 
error

User should see an invalid password error message and should not be 
redirected to the dashboard
